1.name: Lancer's Perk
1.details:
Knight has no scaling on attack speed, meaning his basic attack always remains the same speed.

However, his basic attack deals additional physical damage (scaling with maximum health) to all enemies in a straight line.

2.name: Shield Bash
2.details:
Knight bashes the enemies in a cone-shaped direction with his shield, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power) to all enemies in the area.

Shield Bash also slightly knocks the enemies back and briefly slows them.

3.name: Tumble
3.details: Knight rolls to a target direction, gaining increased armour (scaling with armour) and magic resist (scaling with magic resist) for a duration.

4.name: Valiant Charge
4.details:
Knight charges at a target enemy, pushing the target back along the way and dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power).

If the target is knocked onto a wall, Valiant Charge will stun the target for a short duration, dealing additional physical damage (scaling with physical power).

5.name: Unbreakable Wall
5.details:
Knight holds up his shield and creates a giant wall that blocks all projectiles including ultimate, except turret blasts.

Knight also gains increased movement speed and the ability to move through units. However, he can only use Valiant Charge during Unbreakable Wall.

Using Valiant Charge during Unbreakable Wall will have a much wider range due to his wall and can push multiple enemies at once.
